Our Planet's Air

Our Planet's Air is an interactive map visualising the different air pollutants in major cities using data from the World Air Quality Index.
The AQI rating of each city is represented by a red circle varying in size based on the rating.
Please be patient as the data can take up to a few minutes to load. This message will close when the data is loaded.
Instructions:
  • Click each button to reveal each pollutant
  • Drag to pan and scroll to zoom on the map
  • Hover over each city to see the population and pollution numbers for each city
